Talon:

"We have to be sure that some minion pest doesnt be near of our fel=
low"said Talon


From: Kraftlos 
Sent: Monday, February 15, 2010 6:33 PM
To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come =
back


  
"Heh, so sentinel is still active," Salveo said to himself as he =
stepped off the shuttle.  "We should start repairs on the defense systems a=
s soon as possible."

The rest of the Maxmials began moving supplies off th=
e shuttle into the base.

Meanwhile....

Having no further business, Lord P=
erseus lead the team out of the power room and back toward the entrance; ke=
eping an eye out for enemy movement.

Control room

As the systems powered =
on Kenzo walked down the line of CR chambers to the occupied chamber and wa=
s started to find that it was already entering activation mode.

"Kenzo to =
team," he said into the radio.  "Looks like we have 12 cycles before our gu=
est in the CR chamber awakens."




On Mon, Feb 15, 2010 at 1:22 PM, Super =
Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

  >Talon:
  > 
  >"no good, it m=
ust be our missed Minion" said Talon for a second she tought that Legacy kn=
ew her true nature but she dismised the idea, none knew it besides Lord per=
seus and Kenzo.


  Legacy nodded slightly as he paused. For a long moment =
the dark guardian went completely still, his single optic pulsing slightly.=
 Finally he shook his head.

  Keying his mike he intoned over the Maximal =
channel "I have indeed detected minion communications to and from the base =
but I am unable locate the source. It is likely that the minion within the =
base possesses some sort of sensor deflection field or is hidden behind som=
e of the more dense materials or complex energy fields that my sensors cann=
ot easily penatrate."

  Legacy looked around, noting the different systems=
 that were struggling to come up. "It is likely that whom ever or what ever=
 the minion was communicating with may attempt a rescue or aqcuire reinforc=
ements."

  (TAG)

  OOC: Sorry Kraftlos that I didn't include your charact=
ers via communication channel in my last posts, but I did here :) I hope th=
is keeps the characters active. Sometimes I miss some things.


  Preston
 =
 (Legacy)

s
